content: There's a one-story house where everything is yellow. The walls are yellow. The doors are yellow. Even all the furniture is yellow. The house has yellow beds and yellow couches. What color are the stairs?
Wait, but you said it's a one-story house. So, does that mean there are no stairs? I'm a bit confused here. If it's one-story, why would there be stairs at all? Maybe I'm missing something.
